content.query:
use FnO
go

-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dItemGroup
go

create external table dw.dItemGroup with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dItemGroup'
   ,data_source = ParquetStorage
   ,file_format = ParquetFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vwDimItemGroup
go
